name: Black Forest Cake
description:
8" 3 tiered moist chocolate cake layered with vanilla cream and cherries.
Topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate ganache.

name: Passionfruit and White Chocolate Cake
description: 8" 3 tiered vanilla cake filled with passonfruit curd and covered in Whittakers White Chocolate ganache.

name: Hummingbird Cake
description: 8" 2 tiered hummingbird cake - cinnamon, bananas, pineapple, crunchy pecans and a cream cheese frosting.

name: Carrot Cake Cheesecake
description: 9" nutty and spiced carrot cake swirled with creamy cheesecake.

name: Biscoff Brownie
description: 9" chocolate brownie with a Biscoff filling and topping.

name: Hazelnut Brownie
description: 9" chocolate brownie with a nutella filling and topping, sprinkled with Ferrero Rochers.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Brownie
description: 9" chocolate brownie with Reese's Pieces, swirled with Pics peanut butter.

name: Mint Chocolate Brownie
description: 9" chocolate brownie with Aero Mint Chocolate and topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana Chocolate and crumbled Aero Mint Chocolate.

name: Oreo Brownie
description: 9" chocolate brownie with Oreos in the filling and on top.

name: Chocolate Strawberry Biscuits
description: Indulgent milk chocolate and freeze dried strawberry biscuits.

name: Dark Chocolate and Crystallised Ginger Biscuits
description: Chunks of crystallised ginger and Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate.

name: Dark Chocolate Ganache Biscuits
description: Chocolate biscuits with a Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate ganache center.
